column2: XVI}}, p. 416.</ref> He had an older sister, who is not named.<ref name="sister">{{PM

column1: Berelach served in the [[King's ships]]. For many years he was stationed at the [[Harlond]], but when he was given a high command, he moved to [[Pelargir]] and was often long at sea.<ref name="sister" />
In his youth he was friend of [[Saelon]], who was somehow connected to the "[[Dark Tree]]" – the growing threat of evil in Gondor.<ref>{{PM
